statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_device_configurations WHERE device_id = '24583c7d-3055-4586-8430-542bcc44f05f';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_device_configurations WHERE security_level = 3;
SELECT device_id, configuration FROM smart_home_device_configurations WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT device_name FROM smart_home_device_configurations WHERE last_backup_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_device_configurations ORDER BY device_type DESC, last_backup_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, configuration, last_backup_timestamp, security_level FROM smart_home_device_configurations;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, configuration FROM smart_home_device_configurations WHERE security_level = 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_device_configurations WHERE last_backup_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*), AVG(security_level) FROM smart_home_device_configurations GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_device_configurations WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT * FROM backup_configurations ORDER BY backup_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Living Room%';
SELECT device_id, device_type, location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_type ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location LIKE '%kitchen%';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_configurations WHERE backup_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, configuration->>'wifi_network' AS wifi_network FROM smart_home_devices WHERE configuration->>'wifi_network' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT backup_time, backup_status FROM backup_logs;
SELECT device_id, device_name, configuration FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name = 'Thermostat';
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE device_id = '6b42e9bf-94d0-4b77-b565-5d1d5814a0a5';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name='Thermostat';
SELECT device_id, backup_time, backup_status FROM backup_logs ORDER BY backup_time DESC;
SELECT event_id, device_id, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_type='intrusion' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT device_id, MAX(backup_time) AS last_backup_time FROM backup_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, configuration FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%kitchen%';
SELECT device_name, device_type, configuration FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, configuration FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'light' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id = 'c3f98ab5-a5cb-4abb-9f4a-dc0593d6c5eb';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, configuration FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id IN ('c3f98ab5-a5cb-4abb-9f4a-dc0593d6c5eb','86dea0e2-71fa-45c8-b77e-791b67cf263f');
SELECT * FROM backup_logs JOIN smart_home_devices ON backup_logs.device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id;
SELECT username, email FROM device_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, configuration FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_message, log_date FROM audit_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
